channel.title: Documentation on NesterDC
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on NesterDC

item.title: Pricing
item.description: NesterDC is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.

item.title: Release notes
item.description: NesterDC 7.1 üì¶ Download üìÖ Release date Dec 2, 2002 ‚ú® New Features NNNesterJ style cheat code feature has been added. Many NNNesterJ style cheat codes has been added into zip package. NES external device support. Arkanoid Paddle (controlled by Dreamcast Mouse) Mahjong Controller (controlled by Dreamcast Keyboard) ‚ö°Ô∏è Improvements Optimized emulation speed. Improved source code around UI of Dreamcast. Updated development environment (gcc-3.2, binutils-2.13.1) Some misc improvements. NesterDC 7.0 ‚ú® New Features You can operate the system menu by the 2nd and subsequent controllers besides the 1st controller.
